rock-001.name: River Pebble
rock-001.flavor: A smooth, gray stone, worn by water and time.

rock-002.name: Sharp Flint
rock-002.flavor: Used by early ancestors to make tools.

rock-005.name: Sandstone
rock-005.flavor: Feels like rough sand, because it is.

rock-006.name: Pumice
rock-006.flavor: The only rock that floats on water.

rock-007.name: Small Geode
rock-007.flavor: A plain rock on the outside, full of crystals.

rock-009.name: Rose Quartz
rock-009.flavor: A cloudy pink crystal associated with love.

rock-011.name: Amethyst
rock-011.flavor: A brilliant purple crystal said to calm the mind.

rock-012.name: Lapis Lazuli
rock-012.flavor: A deep blue stone used for pigment by royalty.

rock-013.name: Opal
rock-013.flavor: Catches the light with a fiery, internal rainbow.

rock-014.name: Meteorite
rock-014.flavor: A visitor from the stars. Feels heavy.

rock-015.name: Basalt
rock-015.flavor: The dark, dense rock that forms volcanic islands.

rock-016.name: Limestone
rock-016.flavor: Often contains tiny, fossilized sea creatures.

rock-017.name: Gneiss
rock-017.flavor: A metamorphic rock with distinct wavy bands.

rock-020.name: Garnet
rock-020.flavor: A deep red gemstone, often found in riverbeds.

rock-021.name: Peridot
rock-021.flavor: A bright green gem born in fire.

rock-022.name: Malachite
rock-022.flavor: Forms in beautiful, swirling green patterns.

rock-023.name: Sunstone
rock-023.flavor: Contains tiny copper flakes that glitter in the sun.

rock-024.name: Moonstone
rock-024.flavor: Shines with a soft, pearly, blueish light.

rock-025.name: Petrified Wood
rock-025.flavor: A tree that turned to stone over millions of years.

rock-026.name: Amber
rock-026.flavor: Fossilized tree resin. Sometimes traps insects.

rock-027.name: Sea Glass
rock-027.flavor: Man-made glass, tumbled smooth by the ocean.

rock-028.name: Abalone Shell
rock-028.flavor: The iridescent inner-shell of a sea snail.

rock-030.name: Rainbow Obsidian
rock-030.flavor: An obsidian variant that reveals colored layers.
